name: cancel_schedules
description: Cancel scheduled actions of smart home devices and returns status of those changes.

devices.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

name: details
description:
retrieves the state of devices in the user's home, such as the current temperature,

the current volume, or the current status of a light.

devices.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

name: devices
description: Retrieves smart home devices set up by the user relevant to the query.

traits.description:
Optional list of traits to filter for. If this is empty, all traits will
be allowed (no filter will be enforced).

state.description: Whether to include the dynamic state of the devices.

name: generate_home_automation
description: Generates a home automation script via the Home Agent, and returns the response.

query.description: The query to pass to the Home Agent Bard Service

home_name.description: The home name which the query applies to

name: get_all_devices
description: Retrieves all smart home devices set up by the user.

trait_hints.description:
Optional list of traits to filter for. If this is empty, all traits will
be allowed (no filter will be enforced).

type_hints.description:
Optional list of device_types to filter for. If this is empty, all
device_types will be allowed (no filter will be enforced).

name: get_devices
description: Retrieves smart home devices set up by the user relevant to the query.

trait_hints.description:
Optional list of traits to filter for. If this is empty, all traits will
be allowed (no filter will be enforced).

type_hints.description:
Optional list of device_types to filter for. If this is empty, all
device_types will be allowed (no filter will be enforced).

include_state.description: Whether to include the dynamic state of the devices.

name: mutate
description: Changes traits of smart home devices and returns status of those changes.

devices.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

traits.description: Name of the trait to change.

commands.description: Name of the command. Valid values for command_names depend on trait_name.

values.description: New value of the command_name. Valid values for command_values depend on command_name.

name: mutate_traits
description: Changes traits of smart home devices and returns status of those changes.

device_ids.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

trait_names.description: Name of the trait to change.

command_names.description: Name of the command. Valid values for command_names depend on trait_name.

command_values.description: New value of the command_name. Valid values for command_values depend on command_name. Default is None.

name: run
description: Runs a general operation on smart home devices and returns the status.

devices.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.

op.description: Name of the operation to run.

values.description: Optional list of values for the operation.

time_of_day.description: Time to execute the operation, expected in the format of "HH:MM:SS"

date.description: Date to execute the operation, expected in the format of "YYYY-MM-DD"

am_pm_or_unknown.description: Whether time_of_day is AM or PM or UNKNOWN

delay.description: How long to wait before executing the operation. Example format are 5s, 20m, 1h

duration.description: How long the operation should last. Example format are 5s, 20m, 1h

name: search_home_events
description: Queries the home agent for events in the given home, such as those gathered by camera perception.

query.description: The query to pass to the Home Agent Bard Service

home_name.description: The home name which the query applies to

name: see_devices
description: Retrieves smart home devices set up by the user.

state.description: Whether to include the dynamic state of the devices.

name: view_schedules
description: View scheduled actions of smart home devices and returns status of those changes.

devices.description: Unique identifiers of smart home devices.
